bibl.title: Everlasting Servants of the Gods: Bronze Priests of Ancient Egypt from the Middle Kingdom to the Graeco-Roman Period.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of California, Berkeley. Summary in DA 67 (2006-2007) p. 2789-A. - Investigates the bronze statuary of the ancient Egyptian priest.
bibl.seg: MENDOZA Barbara, Everlasting Servants of the Gods: Bronze Priests of Ancient Egypt from the Middle Kingdom to the Graeco-Roman Period.
